meanings.definition: Showing excessive pride and self-satisfaction in one's achievements or possessions.
meanings.sent1: The boastful boy always talked about how great he was at soccer.
meanings.sent2: She became boastful after winning the science fair.
meanings.sent3: The boastful peacock strutted around the farm, showing off its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: Her boastful claims about her intelligence were like a bright neon sign.
meanings.sent5: The boastful king declared himself the greatest ruler of all time.

meanings.definition: A person who brags or boasts about their accomplishments.
meanings.sent1: The boastful in the group always had a story to tell about their achievements.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand being around a boastful who constantly talked about themselves.
meanings.sent3: The boastful at the party monopolized the conversation with tales of their success.
meanings.sent4: The boastful at work made sure everyone knew about their promotions.
meanings.sent5: The boastful in the class annoyed everyone with their constant bragging.
